mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gameroom (game_setting_id, title, created_at, destroy_at) VALUES (#{gameSettingId},#{title}, SYSTIMESTAMP, #{destroyAt})
mapper.select: SELECT game_room_id AS gameRoomId, game_setting_id AS gameSettingId, title, created_at AS createdAt, destroy_at AS destroyAt FROM gameroom WHERE game_room_id = #{gameRoomId}
